questions.question: The quantity of heat required to raise the temperature of unit mass of the substance through 1K is called

answers.c: Specific heat capacity of a substance

explanations.a: Incorrect – Latent heat relates to phase change.
explanations.b: Incorrect – This refers to total heat needed for a given mass.
explanations.c: Correct – Specific heat capacity is heat per unit mass per unit temperature.
explanations.d: Incorrect – There is a correct answer listed.
Incorrect – There is a correct numerical value.

questions.question: The specific heat capacity of water in KJ/KgK

explanations.a: Incorrect – That is in J/kg·K, not KJ.
explanations.d: Correct – 4.19 KJ/kg·K is the accepted value for water.
